nodes.text: Xanif was a female Twi'lek who worked at Maya Armus, a spa owned by the Hutt Azzim Anjiliac Atirue located at Napdu, the moon of Da Soocha. Before its destruction at the behest of Darth Azard, Azzim ordered Xanif to transmit a recording of Azard's hologram transmission to Azzim's uncle, Vedo. As his last command, Azzim told Xanif to escape from Napdu if she can.
